title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Although youre steadfast about avoiding the unknown, someone is busy convincing you to embrace it. It sounds enticing to another person to throw caution to the wind today. But you have the sense to consider how the trash might blow back in your face afterward. However, you cant become so careful that you stop living and growing. Moderation is essential as you bravely attempt to strike the proper balance. A calculated gamble could be all it takes to change your life. Winston Churchill penned, Success is not final. Failure is not fatal. It is the courage to continue that counts. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
